lexUnit.name: wake.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: emerge from a state of sleep

sentence.text: I woke early the next day and lay in bed , considering what form my apology should take .
Dot woke when she heard Gloria coming down the clanky metal steps outside , heard her stumble her way across the room , and then felt herself being pushed to the far side of the bed .
He had not woken when I returned from my meal at two .
Flavia woke feeling sadder and wiser ; such was her sense of escape , of relief , that she felt free to grieve .
Sometimes Emmie woke feeling empty and lethargic as if everything had been drained out of her ; other mornings , she could hardly wait to get out of bed and begin the day .
HEART op patients often wake thinking they 've just had a baby -- even if they 're men , according to American doctors .
Towards morning she woke limp and exhausted , shivering with cold .
I would wake sleep-logged and weary , and every new day was dull .
But next morning , she had woken determined to make the best of it .
I wake suddenly in the night , aware of the others breathing and the wind banging the tent fabric .
Tug woke suddenly in the dark , out of a nightmare of falling , of rushing water and ground that slipped away beneath his feet .
In the bucket in the cupboard Barry the Time Sprout woke suddenly to find he was in the wrong chapter .
On the farm the animals wake at dawn .
They had woken at eight , and he had made tea and toast for both of them .
That night I woke at half-past three and lay brooding over my lack of progress .
One Christmas Eve I woke at the critical moment , and saw , not Santa Claus , but three familiar figures indulging in heavy horse play at the foot of the bed .
But she would have woken at the sound of an engine .
It might help you to doze off but you will probably find that you wake during the night and can not get back to sleep again .
Even at four in the morning , if he woke during a rare , sleepless night , Dexter liked to brush back the curtains of his bedroom and marvel at the twinkling lights .
Next morning she woke from an intense dream , and did not dare wonder about its meaning .
He clutched me like a terrified child waking from a nightmare .
Then he waited for Louise Taylor to wake from her exhausted sleep .
The Gods are never so dangerous as when they wake from sleep .
He woke in the small hours , feeling cold , and moved over to be closer to Carolyn 's warm body .
I woke in the morning feeling weak and shaky , but quite normal .
We wake in the night with a churning mind and it seems that nothing will settle the anxiety .
The next morning the girls woke to the incessant clatter of the mowing arm circling the big meadow .
After what seemed like only a doze she woke to daylight , the wind driving hail against the window with a force which threatened to break it .
They woke to blue skies and glorious sunshine .
During the night Tallis woke to the sound of wind in branches .
Charity woke to a warbling voice singing happily .
Harry woke with a heavy head .
But she had woken with one of her banging headaches , so that was that .
She woke with a start the next morning , confused and disorientated .
For a fleeting second he wondered if he might be dreaming , but this time he had woken into a nightmare .
Maybe this is a nightmare and I 'll wake .
When Pascoe woke , the room was a cave ; the shrouded lamp cast a dull glow .
The servants woke , and two gentlemen , who were passing in the road below , stopped and looked up at the house .
James Menzies woke abruptly .
He had slept badly and woken badly and was fighting against the sort of headache that usually came on after a big case was finished .
When we opened the door , Fritz was asleep , but he woke immediately .
More than once she woke to see Ben standing silently there in the half dark , staring at them .
I woke as we were arriving in Paris .
He did not wake until seven the following morning .
